4.5. Minor operations removed

  • auto-substitution of mp= on [loop search=profile], [search-region arg=profile]
  • [tag scan]...
  • [tag sql]...
    Many of these are related to one of:
  • Removal of frames logic
  • Removed tags
  • Obsolete methods
  • Old routines for 2.0x compatibility
